channel.title: Computer problems (Sdcit Cant Post Anymore)
channel.description:
I was chatting with Sdcit on msn and he said he cant post anymore he told me to say:
For some reason, I sometimes can't post on websites, uploading on anything won't work for me , etc. And when I try to post on villavu [code]Method Not Implemented ,image/png,*/*;q=0.5 to /nf-errors/unknown.asis not supported. Invalid method in request ,image/png,*/*;q=0.5[/code] Appears :/. Any ideas? Is it because I have nod32 and zone alarm on at the same time? But even when I take them off it doesn't work. This happened right after I uninstalled Avast. P.S. I also ran that 30 sec. restart batch file but it didn't work, maybe that's it?

item.title: Computer problems (Sdcit Cant Post Anymore)
item.dc:creator: @sdcit sdcit
item.description:
@sdcit wrote:

What I mean is, I can post, but the function sometimes doesn’t work and making a topic never works :S

And when I do Post, it says i can’t post new topics on this board…

Read full topic

I was chatting with Sdcit on msn and he said he cant post anymore
he told me to say:

Appears :/. Any ideas? Is it because I have nod32 and zone alarm on at the same time? But even when I take them off it doesn’t work. This happened right after I uninstalled Avast. P.S. I also ran that 30 sec. restart batch file but it didn’t work, maybe that’s it?
